results.title: Relationship Between Calcium Channel Blockers Therapy and Cognitive Function Improvement in Cognitive Decline Patients with Cerebrovascular Disease.
results.text_hl: Changes in MMSE were compared in the target BP reached (TBPR) and non-reached (NTBPR) groups and for CN and @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@CD@@@ groups. Treatment with 5 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@S-amlodipine besylate@@@ for 24 weeks improved MMSE and GDS scores (p < 0.001).

results.title: The EffecTs of Amlodipine and other Blood PREssure Lowering Agents on Microvascular FuncTion in Small Vessel Diseases (TREAT-SVDs) trial: Study protocol for a randomised crossover trial
results.text_hl: Sporadic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@vascular cognitive impairment@@@ are eligible for study inclusion if they are visiting a memory clinic with cognitive complaints and are diagnosed with objective @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ as documented by a validated cognitive assessment tool.

results.title: Triple Therapy Prevention of Recurrent Intracerebral Disease Events Trial: Rationale, design and progress.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: The Triple Therapy Prevention of Recurrent @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@Intracerebral Disease@@@ Events Trial (TRIDENT) aims to determine the effects of a novel SPC "Triple Pill," three generic antihypertensive drugs with demonstrated efficacy and complementary mechanisms of action at half standard dose (@CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ 20 mg, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 2.5 mg, and @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@ 1.25 mg), with placebo for the prevention of recurrent @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@, cardiovascular events, and @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ after @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@.

results.title: Favourable effects of nilvadipine on cognitive function and regional cerebral blood flow on SPECT in hypertensive patients with mild cognitive impairment.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: We compared the effects of @CHEMICAL_nilvadipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C035100 @@@nilvadipine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on the cognitive function and regional cerebral blood flow (rCBF) in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ (@DISEASE_Cognitive_Dysfunction @DISEASE_MESH:D060825 @@@MCI@@@) and @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: [Cognitive Disorders and Dementia in Old Patients With Arterial Hypertension].
results.text_hl: The evidence base of @CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@dihydropyridine@@@ @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonist @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Thiazides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D049971 @@@thiazide@@@-like diuretic @CHEMICAL_Indapamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007190 @@@indapamide@@@-retard is discussed with respect to the prevention of @DISEASE_Dementia @DISEASE_MESH:D003704 @@@dementia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive decline@@@ and their beneficial effect on cognitive function in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Arterial_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000081029 @@@arterial hypertension@@@.

results.title: Combination therapy of atorvastatin and amlodipine inhibits sympathetic nervous system activation and improves cognitive function in hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: The aim of the present study was to determine whether a combination of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ causes sympathoinhibition via reduction of oxidative stress in the RVLM and improves @<m>DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive dysfunction@@@ of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
